subject: The Skinny: Monday May 14, 2007
body:

New Breast Cancer Worries 
A new study links more chemicals found in the air and everyday consumer 
      products to breast cancer in animal tests. And why are fewer women getting 
      mammograms? 
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.  More...
